class.name: RenderDataRD
class.brief_description: Render data implementation for the RenderingDevice based renderers.
class.description: This object manages all render data for the [RenderingDevice]-based renderers. See also [RenderData], [RenderSceneData], and [RenderSceneDataRD]. [b]Note:[/b] This is an internal rendering server object. Do not instantiate this class from a script.
